Inglewood.Lyc\u00e9e Fran\u00e7ais de Los Angeles: Le Lycée Français de Los Angeles is a private bilingual international school founded in 1964 by Raymond and Esther Kabbaz. In the past five decades, the school has expanded from one building to six campuses. Their daughter Clara-Lisa Kabbaz, who has been associated with the school from the beginning as a kindergarten student, now serves as President of the school and Chairman of the Board as she continues her parents' work of providing an international educational experience.
